branchCategory.name: Rodless Cylinder, CY1S-Z, Magnetically Coupled (mm Stroke) - Slide Bearing
branchCategory.description: <p>The CY1S-Z Rodless Cylinder - Magnetically Coupled uses industrial strength magnets located in the piston and external carriage to form a single unit that will travel when actuated with air pressure.  It is a one piece unit integrated with slide bearings which provides lateral stability protecting it from side load impacts.  The CY1S-Z cylinder tube has lube retainers on the internal and external surfaces to retain lubrication.</p>
